column2: ##pythagorean win loss with some kind of classification to show how many wins teams needed this year to make the playoffs and show how they would've reached it add horizontal line?

text = ~paste("Team: ", Team, '
Actual Wins:', W, '
Expected Wins:', Pythag),
layout(title = 'Pythagorean Wins vs Actual Wins', plot_bgcolor = "#e5ecf6", xaxis = list(title = 'Pythagorean Wins'),
yaxis = list(title = 'Actual Wins'), legend = list(title=list(text=' Team Name/Color ')))
